page.title: 14OLDHAM CHRONICLE_ JULY29TH
page.content: The Oldham Chronicle is a newspaper published in the Oldham area, five nights a week.It is not like most local newspapers, it contains local news as well as national news. As well as the news, there is a page devoted to births, deaths and marriages,northern scrapbook,a Tv page,lots of adverts,a classified adverts page and sports page. It costs 16 pence and contains 24 pages. Readers can put letters into the paper on a letters page and all local events are given full coverage with at least four photographs per page.
